TextEng: "Do you know the Reaper's True Name?"
"What is this place? I don't even know where I am."
"Aren't the Hells supposed to be hot?"
"I need to talk to you about Mephistopheles."
"Did he ever mention a Valsharess of the drow?"
"I seek the Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man."
"Ha ha... ha...? Er, I was only kidding..."
"I don't have to answer to you! Bring it on!"
"I'm sorry, I won't do it again..."
"Forget it! I'm not giving you anything!"
"Alright, I'll be back with the money."
"Forget it! I'm not giving you anything!"
"There was an imp caught in it."
"You've got an imp in your grinder."
"Look, maybe we can declare today a holiday."
<StartCheck>[Intelligence: Success]</Start> "Mephistopheles has left Cania, for starters."
"We need to work on your management style."
"Forget it! I'm not giving you anything!"
"That sounds good, Gru'ul, but I don't have the names you want."
Text: "좋게 들리는데, 그루울. 하지만 네가 원하는 이름이 없어."

TextEng: "That sounds good, Gru'ul. Let's do it."
"Ixthyria the Scalesinger, the kobold known as Deekin."
"Qeyifalia the Skyseeker, the drow known as Nathyrra."
"Oeskathine the Demonwrestler, the tiefling known as Valen."
"Va'ardalia the Twinsouled, the spirit known as Aribeth."
"What use do you have for someone's True Name?"
"I want that artifact for free, Gru'ul..."
"Fine. Then I'll just have to kill you for it."
"What tall tales have you been hearing?"
"I want you to declare a holiday for your workers."
"I demand that you show me your store!"
"I command you to be good to the end of your days..."
"But there's an imp in your grinder!"
"He named you Quarry Boss? That must be quite the honor..."
